about_the_game:
• A Cute and Spooky Creature Collecting Game with a Fall / Halloween Aesthetic

  • An In-Depth Battle System: Including 200+ moves and 15 different elemental types.

  • Create Your Own Character: Set your character's appearance, as well as their class and elemental type, giving every character a unique move-set and role in battles.

  • Explore Unique and Colorful Areas: Explore magical forests, haunted houses, a fairytale town where people live in giant pumpkins, and more!

  • A Grind-Free RPG Experience: Experience and character progression are designed to minimize grinding and cut bloat content out of the game.

  • Full of Minigames and Side Content: Dance with a turkey, spend all your money on scratch-cards, escape a haunted house, and more!

  • 10+ Hours of Gameplay: (Demo playtime: 30 mins - 1 hour)
